text: All Souls Night is a 2018 Filipino horror film written and directed by Aloy Adlawan, starring Andi Eigenmann, Allan Paule and Yayo Aguila. The film was produced by Viva Films in co-production with Aliud Entertainment and ImaginePerSecond. It was released in the Philippines on 31 October 2018. ==Cast== ==References== ==External links== * Category:Viva Films films Category:Philippine films
title: All Souls Night (film)
